Package it.polimi.se2019.view.gui

Class PlayerBoardFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
              • it.polimi.se2019.view.gui.PlayerBoardFX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    class PlayerBoardFX
extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
    Represents a player board displaying all the player's ammunition, damages, marks and the weapons that aren't loaded. It also shows the player reward points. It is not resizable by default since certain elements have fixed position, so it needs external scaling.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerBoardFX

        PlayerBoardFX​(ViewPlayer viewPlayer)
        Creates a new PlayerBoardFX with the default player board and sets the players username.
        Parameters:
        viewPlayer - the ViewPlayer associated with this player board

    • Method Detail

      • updateImage

        private void updateImage​(java.lang.String color)
        Loads and shows the correct player board image and the image of the frenzy actions to be displayed later.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the correct player board

      • displayDamages

        private void displayDamages​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> damages)
        Updates the damages displayed by the player board. The damages ImageViews are already present on the player board, they are just set visible and the color is shifted to match the corresponding player color.
        Parameters:
        damages - the list of the damages that the corresponding player currently has

      • displayAmmos

        private void displayAmmos​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ammos)
        Displays the ammo that the player currently has. Ammo are represented as Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        ammos - a list of the ammo owned by the player

      • displayMarks

        private void displayMarks​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> marks)
        Displays the marks that the player currently has. The same mechanism used for displaying damages is applied here.
        Parameters:
        marks - the marks that the player currently has

      • updatePlayerInfo

        void updatePlayerInfo​(ViewPlayer viewPlayer)
        It updates all the players info.
        Parameters:
        viewPlayer - the player represented in this player board

      • triggerFrenzy

        private void triggerFrenzy()
        Shows the frenzy actions image if the player has received enough damage.

      • drawSkulls

        private void drawSkulls()
        Draws the skulls over the rewards that have already been taken.

      • drawWeapons

        private void drawWeapons()
        Draws the unloaded weapons that can be seen by all players on the right side of the player board.
